name: sql for Service Info from B1 SLDData
func:
msg.configOverrideHana.database = 'SLDDATA';

if (!msg.flowInfo)
    msg.flowInfo = {};
    
msg.flowInfo.sql =`
SELECT *,SUBSTR_REGEXPR('[://|@](\\w*):' IN "SLD_AccessURL" GROUP 1) AS "SLD_ServerLocation"
FROM (
(
select
'HANA_IndexServer' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"NAME" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
0 AS "VisualOrder",
"ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "DBSERVERINSTANCES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_LicenseManager' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
10 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "LICENSESERVERS"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_Mailer' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
20 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "MAILERSERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_Alert' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
30 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "MAILERSERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_MobileService' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
40 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "MOBILESERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_AnalyticsPlatform' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
50 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "B1AHSERVERS"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_BackupService' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"LINK" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
60 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "BACKUPSERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_EDS' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
70 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "ELECTRONICDOCSERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_WebClient' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
80 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "B1WEBCLIENTS"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_ServiceLayer' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
90 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "B1SERVICELAYERS"
)
);
`;


return msg;

name: SQL
session check
CREATE TABLE ENT_JOBS
topic: CREATE TABLE ENT_JOBS(JOB_ID TEXT PRIMARY KEY, JOB_NAME TEXT NOT NULL, BASE_SCHEMA TEXT, TARGET_SCHEMA TEXT, STATUS CHAR(1) NOT NULL,  FREQUENCY CHAR(1), START_ON DATETIME, END_ON DATETIME, SCHEDULED CHAR(1) NOT NULL, JOB_TYPE TEXT NOT NULL, CONFIGURATION TEXT, CREATED_ON DATETIME NOT NULL);

name: CREATE TABLE ENT_USERS
topic: CREATE TABLE ENT_USERS(USER_ID PRIMARY KEY, NAME TEXT, USERNAME TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, ROLE TEXT NOT NULL, PASSWORD TEXT NOT NULL, BLOCKED CHAR(1), CREATED_ON DATETIME NOT NULL);

name: CREATE TABLE ENT_JOB_LOGS
topic: CREATE TABLE ENT_JOB_LOGS(LOG_ID TEXT PRIMARY KEY, JOB_ID TEXT NOT NULL, STARTED_ON TEXT NOT NULL, ENDED_ON TEXT, STATUS CHAR(1) NOT NULL, RUN_TYPE CHAR(1) NOT NULL, MSG TEXT, CONFIGURATION TEXT,  FOREIGN KEY (JOB_ID) REFERENCES ENT_JOBS (JOB_ID) ON UPDATE SET NULL ON DELETE SET NULL)

name: Alter TABLE ENT_JOB_LOGS
topic: ALTER TABLE ENT_JOB_LOGS ADD COLUMN RUN_TYPE CHAR(1);

name: CREATE TABLE ENT_USERS
topic: CREATE TABLE ENT_USERS(USER_ID PRIMARY KEY, NAME TEXT, USERNAME TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, ROLE TEXT NOT NULL, PASSWORD TEXT NOT NULL, BLOCKED CHAR(1), CREATED_ON DATETIME NOT NULL);

name: CREATE TABLE ENT_EMAIL_TEMPLATE
topic: CREATE TABLE ENT_EMAIL_TEMPLATE(TEMPLATE_ID PRIMARY KEY, CODE TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, NAME TEXT, TEXT_HTML TEXT NOT NULL, LANGUAGE TEXT, CREATED_ON DATETIME NOT NULL);

func:
"CREATE TABLE ENT_EMAIL_TEMPLATE(TEMPLATE_ID PRIMARY KEY, CODE TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, NAME TEXT, TEXT_HTML TEXT NOT NULL, LANGUAGE TEXT, CREATED_ON DATETIME NOT NULL);" msg.topic = `INSERT INTO ENT_EMAIL_TEMPLATE(TEMPLATE_ID, CODE, NAME , TEXT_HTML, LANGUAGE, CREATED_ON) VALUES ('1', 'COPY_COMPANY', 'COPY_COMPANY', '

Hello Admin

Following Job is started/completed:



Started On Ended On Status Run Type Message Configuration
$$STARTED_ON$$ $$ENDED_ON$$ $$STATUS$$ $$RUN_TYPE$$ $$MSG$$ $$CONFIGURATION$$


Thanks and Regards

B1 System Management Tool
', 'EN', datetime('now', 'localtime'));`; return msg;

name: CREATE TABLE ENT_SERVERS
topic: CREATE TABLE ENT_SERVERS(SERVER_ID PRIMARY KEY, HOSTNAME TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, PORT INTEGER DEFAULT 22, USERNAME TEXT NOT NULL, PASSWORD TEXT NOT NULL, CREATED_ON DATETIME NOT NULL);

name: CREATE TABLE ENT_CONFIG
topic: CREATE TABLE ENT_CONFIG(CONFIG_ID PRIMARY KEY, KEY TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, VALUE TEXT NOT NULL, CREATED_ON DATETIME NOT NULL);

name: sql for Service Info from B1 SLDData
func:
msg.configOverrideHana = {
    database: 'SLDDATA'
};
if (!msg.flowInfo)
    msg.flowInfo = {};
//msg.flowInfo.sql = 'call SBOCOMMON.TMSP_GETCOMPLIST2';
msg.flowInfo.sql =`
SELECT *,SUBSTR_REGEXPR('[://|@](\\w*):' IN "SLD_AccessURL" GROUP 1) AS "SLD_ServerLocation"
FROM (
(
select
'HANA_IndexServer' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"NAME" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
0 AS "VisualOrder",
"ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "DBSERVERINSTANCES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_LicenseManager' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
10 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "LICENSESERVERS"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_Mailer' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
20 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "MAILERSERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_Alert' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
30 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "MAILERSERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_MobileService' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
40 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "MOBILESERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_AnalyticsPlatform' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
50 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "B1AHSERVERS"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_SLD_BackupService' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"LINK" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
60 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "BACKUPSERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_EDS' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
70 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "ELECTRONICDOCSERVICES"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_WebClient' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
80 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "B1WEBCLIENTS"
)
UNION ALL
(
select
'B1_ServiceLayer' AS "ServiceCode",
"ID" AS "SLD_ServiceID",
-- "NAME" AS "SLD_ServerLocation",
"ACCESSURL" AS "SLD_AccessURL",
90 AS "VisualOrder",
"LOGICALMACHINE_ID" AS "SLD_LogicalMachine_ID"
from "B1SERVICELAYERS"
)
);
`;


//  call SBOCOMMON.TMSP_GETCOMPLIST
return msg;
